text:
Meghan Markle has accompanied Prince Harry to the Sentebale polo match in Windsor today, which honors the eponymous charity the royal founded in 2006 to support children plighted by AIDs.



The Duchess of Sussex wore a belted navy wrap dress by Carolina Herrera for the occasion, paired with nude Aquazzura pumps, sunglasses, and a J.Crew basket clutch. She previously wore Herrera with her pink ensemble at her first Trooping the Colour in June.



Samir Hussein Getty Images

Video; Meghan joins Prince Harry at the @Sentebale Polo She is wearing a dress by Carolina Herrera pic.twitter.com/SHsM74Xht4 — Rebecca English (@RE_DailyMail) July 26, 2018

She and the Duke of Sussex were seen making an entrance on the red carpet with polo star Nacho Figueras and his wife Delfina Blaquier, who are close friends of Prince Harry and attended the royal wedding in May.

Chris Jackson Getty Images

Sentebale chairman Johnny Hornby and CEO Cathy Ferrier were also in attendance, reports Richard Palmer, The Express' royal correspondent. The event took place at The Royal County of Berkshire Polo Club in Windsor.

Chris Jackson Getty Images

We previously saw Markle showing off her polo style at the Audi Polo Challenge in Ascot earlier this month. For the first day she wore a brown gingham shirtdress with sandals and a panama hat. For the second, she kept it casual in a white button-down shirt and black pants.



Samir Hussein Getty Images

J.Crew clutch, $71, jcrew.com. SHOP

Figueras and Harry have played polo several times before. "He's very competitive," he previously told BAZAAR.com. "“He's not an easy opponent, and he's a good teammate."

Of the royal wedding, the polo player recalled, "It was an incredible moment, an incredible place, a historic moment, so it was great." He also joked about the afterparty: “The reception at the castle was great, and the second reception, I don't remember.”
title: Meghan Markle Wears a Navy Carolina Herrera Dress to Sentebale Polo Match

og.title: Meghan Markle Just Wore the Perfect Carolina Herrera Dress at a Polo Match
og.description: She's supporting Prince Harry at the Sentebale polo match.
